tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE faq_relations (
  question_id INT,
  response_id INT,
  category_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (question_id) REFERENCES faq_questions(question_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (response_id) REFERENCES faq_responses(response_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES faq_categories(category_id)
);
